title: Drawing, "Two Victories in Roundels", 1812
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush with brownish grey wash on rough laid paper
inscribed: Caption above top medallion, "Vittorie;" and bottom medallion "Vittore"
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description:
Vertical rectangle top: circular medallion with Victory in chariot, directed toward left.  Bottom: ovoidal medallion with two female genii raising wreaths above, panoply. Caption above top medallion, "Vittorie;" and bottom medallion "Vittore"

Captions, as in 1901-39-3259: "Vittorie." Verso: part of pen sketch similar to 1901-39-3259.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Two Victories in Roundels", 1812.
1812. Pen and brown ink, brush with brownish grey wash on rough laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3260.
